# Xiaomi Redmi 3 (ido) specific changes:
- Switched to user build type - Up-to-date device-specific changes from LineageOS - kernel: Switched to new kernel based on qcom cm-14.1 common kernel - kernel: CAF release LA.BR.1.2.9_rb1.26 - kernel: Built with custom Linaro GCC 7.2.1 Snapshot 2017.10, optimized for Cortex-A53 - kernel: Patched CVE-2017-13080, CVE-2017-15265 - kernel: Rolled back prima to LA.BR.1.2.9_rb1.26 - kernel: Stronger yama ptrace scope policy - kernel: GPU initial frequency lowered to 220MHz - kernel: qcom wakelocks blocked by default - kernel: Disabled rest of CPU governors - kernel: Available I/O schedulers: noop, deadline, CFQ, FIOPS, zen - kernel: FIOPS at boot and zen as default I/O scheduler - kernel: Available TCP congestion algorithms: westwood+, cubic, reno, veno, Vegas, Illinois - kernel: TCP congestion algorithm switched to Vegas by default - kernel: Entropy values set to 512/128 by default - kernel: Some other changes, but not mentioned here to prevent changelog from flooding your screen :P
